p: A rabbit polyclonal antibody against NP was purchased from Thermo-Fisher Scientific. Goat anti-rabbit IgG conjugated to fluorescein isothiocyanate (FITC) were purchased from Zhongshan Golden Bridge Biotechnology (Beijing, China). The mouse anti-GAPDH monoclonal antibody and anti-GFP antibody were purchased from Santa Cruz Biotechnology. HRP goat anti-mouse IgG was purchased from Beyotime.
